scripts.build:css: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); for (const f of ['index.html','demo.html','calculator.html','terms.html','privacy.html','security.html']) { let s=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8'); s=s.replace(/\s+/g,' ').replace(/>\s+</g,'><'); fs.writeFileSync('dist/'+f,s); }"
scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -R assets/* dist/assets/ && cp manifest.webmanifest sw.js dist/
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build:css && npm run copy:assets
